name: tweenzy
description: A simple utility to easily create performant tweening.
author: @jaxgeller

scripts.dev: watchify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015] ]  -o dist/tweenzy.js -s Tweenzy src/tweenzy.js
scripts.release: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015] ] -t uglifyify -o dist/tweenzy.js -s Tweenzy src/tweenzy.js
